thread.section_title: One.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of One.com | www.one.com
thread.title: Charles Phillip Baker
thread.title_full: One.com reviewed by Charles Phillip Baker

author: Charles Phillip Baker
title: Charles Phillip Baker
text: They keep renewing your hosting even though you initially pay in advance. If it runs out after 12 months, the account should turn off, well not here; there will keep invoicing you adding changes for a service you don't even need. This is illegal, sending letters and treating further cost is a joke.
